text: Not even Mario 3? Whoa.
author: electricmastro

text: The NES is 30 years old today! I associate this console with my first gaming years, mostly when I was 4-10 years old. That and the Gameboy, of course. I don't even think there's a single NES game in my top 20 of all time, but there were tons of classics that paved the way for refined games/sequels on later consoles like the SNES. Huge nostalgia factor as well, just looking at the graphics or hearing NES music is enough for me to jump back in those days. This ninja action platformer is great!
author: SupraDarky
